summary: This document appears to be a standard email footer or notice from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim, indicating remote work procedures during the COVID-19 pandemic. It contains confidentiality language and is part of the Epstein case document set, though the substantive content of the communication is not included in this excerpt.

persons.name: Bobbi C. Sternheim
persons.context: The document is from the Law Offices of Bobbi C. Sternheim, containing a COVID-19 notice and confidentiality disclaimer.
